text: (nabiye!)oba mese pavasanu: “allah hæra, kumak oba (devivarun yayi)adahas karamin sitiyeda, eva oba aradhana kara balanu. ahashi hobhumiyehi ho evata ek anu pramanayakata ho balayak næta. tavadae deken (kisivak) ho (eva utpadanaya kirimehi) mevata kisimahavulak næta. (mehi) ohuta udavkaruvanda ovungen kisivekutnæta”
